title: Integrated Digital Anatomy Simulation Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic human anatomy terminology and structures
context.additional_context: A language education course operating in a smartphone-centered, limited-technology environment, measuring learning outcomes through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the spatial relationships of human organs with 80% accuracy using a 3D anatomy platform.
Learners can develop a step-by-step protocol to analyze anatomical structures by applying visualization tools within the platform.
Learners can describe anatomical terminology in the target language (English/Korean) with over 90% accuracy through interaction with digital tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
